snippet: Raul Ibanez’s ground-rule double drove home Robinson Cano with the winning run, and Mariano Rivera closed out the 4-hour-38-minute game with a perfect inning.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Baltimore Orioles, 5-4, in extra innings.
lead_paragraph: Raul Ibanez’s ground-rule double drove home Robinson Cano with the winning run, and Mariano Rivera closed out the 4-hour-38-minute game with a perfect inning.

headline.seo: Yankees Win Long After Garcia’s Five Wild Pitches
headline.main: Long After Garcia’s Five Wild Pitches, the Yankees Pull Out a Victory
headline.print_headline: Long After Garcia’s Five Wild Pitches, the Yankees Pull Out a Victory
